HostAddon introduces new resourceful series of VPS Hosting. Are you trying to upgrade from shared hosting and looking for more space, ram and bandwidth and more control within the budget of a shared hosting. Look no further, our simple, powerful VPSes are perfectly crafted for performance at fraction of the cost of a dedicated server. Our brigade of powerful 24 core servers backed with RAID 10 protected storage helps us provide you with the high performance VPS.

Why Host Addon Ltd?

1. HostAddon VPS host nodes are built with enterprise-class HP servers featuring highly-redundant RAID 10 storage systems and minimum 24 core CPUs.

2. Redundant, high-capacity, lightening fast network with 99.9% Availability Guaranteed and More than 550 GBit External Connection.

3. 24x7 support team working hard to make sure that the VPS performs the way you want it to perform.
